movies.name: Fast X
movies.description: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

movies.name: London Has Fallen
movies.description: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

movies.name: Law Abiding Citizen
movies.description: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.

movies.name: King Kong
movies.description: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.
